title: The Great Gatsby
description: A novel set in the Roaring Twenties, it tells the story of Jay Gatsby's unrequited love for Daisy Buchanan.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality, seen through the eyes of a young girl in the American South.
A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother, exploring themes of surveillance, censorship, and individuality.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century, focusing on the turbulent relationship between Elizabeth Bennet and Fitzwilliam Darcy.

title: Moby-Dick
description: A novel about the quest of Ishmael to hunt the elusive whale, Moby Dick, exploring themes of obsession, revenge, and humanity.
